repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:14.04 
MAINTAINER Ignacio Mill√°n <ignacio.millan@bq.com> 
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python-pip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
COPY src /usr/local/src 
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r /usr/local/src/requirements.txt

EXPOSE 80 
WORKDIR /usr/local/src 
ENTRYPOINT ["python","webapp.py"]
